name: Colored Ball: Speedball Rush
summary:
Colored Ball: Speedball Rush is an exhilarating, quick ball game that will give you an adrenaline rush! Direct the fastball only to enter the gate with the same color as the color ball. If you love colorful ball game, this is a perfect game for you! Why don’t you give our speed ball game a go and have the time of your life?
do you know how to play this fast-paced speed ball game? The game mechanic is very simple. The quick ball will get through colored barrier. Each time it runs through it, this zooming space ball will change it color to the barrier’s color. You have to direct the color ball only to touch the gate with the same color as the fastball. It’s definitely a challenge to direct the ball when it’s going fast like this
